body_html:
Ok, the error that you're getting is because of visibility. You have to to contrib/layers/kernels:layer_norm_fused_kernel rule, and set the visibility to your rule, something like

visibility= ["//tensorflow/contrib/layers/python/ops/..."],
body_text:
Ok, the error that you're getting is because of visibility. You have to to contrib/layers/kernels:layer_norm_fused_kernel rule, and set the visibility to your rule, something like
visibility= ["//tensorflow/contrib/layers/python/ops/..."],
body:
Ok, the error that you're getting is because of visibility. You have to to contrib/layers/kernels:layer_norm_fused_kernel rule, and set the visibility to your rule, something like 

```
visibility= ["//tensorflow/contrib/layers/python/ops/..."],
```
